Sample.Title: HSPA5_1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The transfection with siRNA was done either with 10 nM siRNA pair or 10 nM siRNA universal negative control and using approximately 100 000 cells and duoble transfection. The first transfection was done in suspension and the second transfection in adherent cells.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: The HTR-8/Svneo cells were cultured in RPMI 1640 medium supplemented with 10 % fetal bovine serum, 100 U/ml penicillin, 100 mg/ml streptomycin, 2 mM glutamine and 1 mM sodium pyruvate.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was isolated by using RNeasy Micro Kit TruSeq® Stranded mRNA Sample Preparation, Illumina (15031047)

Sample.Data-Processing: Base-calling was done with bcl2fastq2 conversion software (NovaSeq 6000) Read alignment and counting was done using Rsubread package (v. 2.0) using in-built RefSeq gene annotation. Genome_build: hg38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Processed data file rsubread_featureCounts.csv is tab delimited text file containing the genewise read counts for each sample.

Series.Title: Functional role of HSPA5 in trophoblasts
Series.Summary: Analysis of the effect of HSPA5 siRNA experiment
Series.Overall-Design: RNA-seq analysis of silenced HSPA5 (n = 3) and negative control (n=3) samples
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
